segments.text: The kitchen layout is straightforward, with counters and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman faces the sink, drying a single plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, but the sink can't hold it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water spills out, wetting the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She remains composed, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, upper cabinets stand open, revealing the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy balances on a two-step stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans back slightly, unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl watches from the floor, reaching toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window, showing a peaceful garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, everything tidy outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the scene holds subtle risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a typical moment, yet tense with possibility.
segments.speaker: PAR
